org.alienideology.jcord.handle.managers

Interface IInviteManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InviteManager

    public interface IInviteManager
    IInviteManager - A manager for managing invites in both a guild or a guild channel.
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IInvite createInvite(int maxUses, long maxAge, boolean isTemporary, boolean isUnique)
      Create a new invite for the guild channel.
      void deleteInvite(IInvite invite)
      Deletes an existing invite.
      void deleteInvite(java.lang.String code)
      Deletes an existing invite by code.
      java.util.List<IInvite> getChannelInvites()
      Get the invites of a channel.
      IGuild getGuild()
      Get the guild this invite managers manages invites from.
      IGuildChannel getGuildChannel()
      Get the channel this invites managers manages.

      Get the identity this invite managers belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentity

        Identity getIdentity()
        Get the identity this invite managers belongs to.
        Returns:
        The identity.

      • getGuild

        IGuild getGuild()
        Get the guild this invite managers manages invites from.
        Returns:
        The guild.

      • getGuildChannel

        IGuildChannel getGuildChannel()
        Get the channel this invites managers manages.
        Returns:
        The channel. Can be ITextChannel or IVoiceChannel.

      • getGuildInvites

        java.util.List<IInvite> getGuildInvites()
        Get the invites of a guild. This is equivalent to getting the invites of a default channel of a guild. Channel specific invites are not included in this list. It is recommended to cache the invites.
        Returns:
        The guild invites.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manager Server permission.

      • getChannelInvites

        java.util.List<IInvite> getChannelInvites()
        Get the invites of a channel. If this invite manager is under a guild, this will be getting the default channel's invites of that guild.
        Returns:
        The channel invites.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manager Channels permission in that channel.
        See Also:
        IGuild.getDefaultChannel()

      • createInvite

        IInvite createInvite(int maxUses,
                     long maxAge,
                     boolean isTemporary,
                     boolean isUnique)
        Create a new invite for the guild channel. If this manager is under a guild, the invite will be created under the default channel.
        Parameters:
        maxUses - Max number of uses of the invite. (0 for unlimited uses)
        maxAge - Max durations in second before expiry (0 for unlimited age)
        isTemporary - True if this invite only grant temporarily membership.
        isUnique - True for creating unique one time use invites.
        Returns:
        The invite created.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Create Instant Invite permission.

      • deleteInvite

        void deleteInvite(IInvite invite)
        Deletes an existing invite.
        Parameters:
        invite - The invite.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manager Channels permission.

      • deleteInvite

        void deleteInvite(java.lang.String code)
        Deletes an existing invite by code.
        Parameters:
        code - The invite code.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manager Channels permission.
